to_char(bo_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bo_reg_date , to_char(bo_mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bo_mod_date , b.comm_nm AS bo_category_nm , bo_del_yn FROM free_board a, comm_code b WHERE bo_no=#{boNo} AND a.bo_category=b.comm_cd
